description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (s73) to vary condition 4 (Restricted Opening Hours) of planning permission ref: P/2005/0795 dated 21/04/2005 for: Change of use of shop from Class B1 (Office) to Class A3 (Restaurant); installation of ventilation duct to rear elevation. Variation seeks to allow extended operating hours of the business to be from 07:00am to 11:00pm Monday to Sunday and Bank/Public Holidays
decision_conditions: The use permitted shall not operate outside 07:00 to 23:00 hours Monday to Sundays and Bank or Public Holidays.

Reason: To accord with the terms of the application and preserve and maintain the amenities of occupiers of neighbouring residential properties, in accordance with policy 7.15 of the London Plan 2016 , policies 1.1 (j) of the adopted Ealing's Development (Core) Strategy 2026 (2012) and policy 7A of the adopted Ealing's Development Management Document (2013).
| Provision for refuse and recycling storage in accordance with adopted standards shall be provided and continuously available and retained for the life of the development hereby approved.
Reason: To provide adequate refuse and recycling storage facilities to align with policy 5.17 of the London Plan (2016).

| All external doors to the kitchen shall be fitted with self-closing devices, which shall be maintained in an operational condition and at no time shall any external door nor windows to the kitchen be fixed in an open position.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise, smell, steam or other effluent, in accordance with Policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2016)  and policy 7A of the Adopted Development Management Plan DPD (2013).
